## Discussion

The incoming MTU represents the maximum L2CAP packet size for packets being sent by the remote device.

# incomingMTU

**Instance Property**

Returns the current incoming MTU for the L2CAP channel.

## Declaration

```swift
var incomingMTU: BluetoothL2CAPMTU { get }
```

## Discussion

The incoming MTU represents the maximum L2CAP packet size for packets being sent by the remote device.
title: incomingMTU
